description: From the Latin refocillō, an alternative form of refocilō.

verbs.description: refocillate (third-person singular simple present refocillates, present participle refocillating, simple past and past participle refocillated)

examples: by sinking into it, quoth Paræus, as into so much butter, the nose was comforted, nourish'd, plump'd up, refresh'd, refocillated, and set a growing for ever.
